top_comments.comment:
A HUGE thanks to Drew and Linda Scott for helping design the interior of my new home! Go follow them on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/athome. 

Would you like to see any other videos of the house? I can show whats in my fridge, pantry, Mike's Office, and more! Let me know
This is one of the prettiest house and also one of my favourite house love you♥️💖
So nice to see how you define home 🏡

comments_since_last_sample.body: What a gorgeous home! I just bought my first home and it is about the size of that master bedroom haha. Hopefully someday I can upgrade to something more substantial too. Congratulations!
Tell me ur rich without telling me ur rich! She'll start:
omg i remember the first ever video i've watched from ro was her mario cake in a very small kitchen, stumbling upon this video years later makes me so proud of her!
So gorgeous Ro! im so proud of you for working so hard, and creating a beautiful dream house!
The cinematography is so good that I thought this was an AD feature for like... eleven minutes. dupped me
You should tell " my castel tour ".I mean its too big man.
So nice to see how you define home 🏡
Love your house and the haircut !!!
if pewdiepie ever saw this house he would give it an S rating beacuse it is truely stunning
i love how u manage to make it feel so homey
the one name i came up instantly for ro`s barista was barbara hahahah
